transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+2% Ally Team Accuracy
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+2% Ally Team Accuracy
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Close-Range Fire
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to grant increased Attack to the ally with the highest Attack for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Inflicts Marked on the target before attacking for 2 turns

description: Attacks an enemy. After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000101_1_1]</color> chance to grant increased Attack to the ally with the highest Attack for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000101_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Mid-Range Acrobatic Shooting
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to grant increased Critical Hit Chance and Critical Damage to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>, then attacks an enemy.\n\nWhen attacking an <color=#ffd732>Irregular</color>, inflicts reduced Defense on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color> before attacking. This effect ignores the target's Resilience and Immunity.
description: Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000101_2_1]</color> chance to grant increased Critical Hit Chance and Critical Damage to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000101_2_1] turn(s)</color>, then attacks an enemy.\n\nWhen attacking an <color=#ffd732>Irregular</color>, inflicts reduced Defense on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000101_2_3] turn(s)</color> before attacking. This effect ignores the target's Resilience and Immunity.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Voltaic Arrowstorm
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to grant increased Accuracy and Effectiveness to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>, then attacks all enemies.\nHas a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to reduce <color=#28d9ed>skill cooldowns</color> of all allies except for the caster by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000101_3_1]</color> chance to grant increased Accuracy and Effectiveness to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000101_3_1] turn(s)</color>, then attacks all enemies.\nHas a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000101_3_3]</color> chance to reduce <color=#28d9ed>skill cooldowns</color> of all allies except for the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000101_3_3] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, reduces skill cooldowns of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, reduces skill cooldowns of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000101_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000101_backup_1_1]</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
